description: A simple stomach replacement. It takes up significantly less room than a biologic stomach, but prevents the use of other digestive bionics and requires minor upkeep.
A basic heart replacement. You're much less likely to have a heart attack with this, but who wants to test that? Prevents utilization of other heart bionics.
An advanced heart replacement. Replaces significant portions of your vascular system. Compatible with other bionics that interact with the heart.
Replacement lungs. They nullify asthma, but can get gummed up just like normal lungs. Prevents the usage of other lung bionics.
